name: Daily Stars
description: Lets you see your daily stars count !

show-in-browser.name: Show Stat In The Level Search Page
show-in-browser.description: Toggles on and off the Daily Stars stat in the level search page

show-in-garage.name: Show Stat In The Garage
show-in-garage.description: Toggles on and off the Daily Stars stat in the Garage (Where you can change your icons)

enable-particles.name: Enable the particles
enable-particles.description: Enables the particles that are behind the daily stars
